data.comment: The match is underway at Nissan Stadium.
Throw-in Dallas.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nashville to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
In the minute 5, Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nashville.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 9, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
Michael Barrios is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Dallas's Michael Barrios looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 11, Marcos De Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Dallas.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 15, Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Dallas throw-in in Nashville's half.
In the minute 16, Dallas pushes forward through Andres Ricaurte, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
Goal kick for Dallas at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 19, Dallas take a 0-1 lead thanks to Ryan Hollingshead.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 22, Bryan Reynolds (Dallas) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Nashville.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nashville close to the penalty box.
In the minute 25, Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jack Maher for Nashville who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 28, Gary Smith (Nashville) has taken off Jack Maher who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Jalil Anibaba is the replacement.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 31, In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Dallas throw-in in Nashville's half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in Nashville.
Nashville to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 36, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Can Nashville capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dallas's half?
Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 37, Marcos De Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 40, Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Dallas a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Marcos De Oliveira will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Throw-in for Dallas at Nissan Stadium.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 45, Nashville push upfield and Dave Romney gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Dallas defence.
Marcos De Oliveira blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Nashville throw-in in Dallas's half.
In the minute 46, Jhonder Cadiz is on a sub for Daniel Rios for Nashville.
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 48, Dallas have a goal kick.
Free kick Nashville.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
In the minute 51, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
Free kick for Nashville in the half of Dallas.
Randall Leal for Nashville gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Dallas.
In the minute 55, Dallas to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Dallas.
In the minute 58, Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
Goal kick for Dallas at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 63, Nashville have a goal kick.
Michael Barrios (Dallas) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 67, Jhonder Cadiz for the home team is judged to be offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nashville.
In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 69, Marcos De Oliveira awards Dallas a goal kick.
Nashville make their third substitution with Alex Muyl replacing Matt LaGrassa.
In the minute 70, Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Handwalla Bwana is replacing Randall Leal for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Dallas.
Tanner Tessmann is replacing Jesus Ferreira for the away team.
In the minute 72, Nashville needs to be cautious. Dallas have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
Ricardo Pepi of Dallas smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 77, Marcos De Oliveira signals a Nashville throw-in in Dallas's half.
The home team have replaced Brian Anunga with Derrick Jones. This is the fifth substitution made today by Gary Smith.
Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 79, Marcos De Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Nashville are pushing forward but Jhonder Cadiz's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Dallas at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 79, Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
Nashville's Jhonder Cadiz attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nashville.
In the minute 80, Luchi Gonzalez (Dallas) is making a second substitution, with Harold Mosquera replacing Ricardo Pepi.
Harold Mosquera gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dallas.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
In the minute 82, Nashville drives forward and Alex Muyl gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Walker Zimmerman (Nashville) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 83, Dallas have a goal kick.
Thiago Santos is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Luchi Gonzalez is making the team's third substitution at Nissan Stadium with Reto Ziegler replacing Thiago Santos.
In the minute 85, Dallas to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Dallas a goal kick.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
Free kick Nashville.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nashville.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Throw-in for Dallas at Nissan Stadium.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
The match has come to a close in Nashville. The final score is 0-1.
Ryan Hollingshead for Dallas has been booked by Marcos De Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
Attention is being given to Dallasâ€™s Bryan Reynolds and play has been suspended briefly.
